name: Suchindram Thanumalayan Temple
description: Suchindram Thanumalayan Temple, also known as the Sthanumalayan Temple, is dedicated to the trinity of Brahma, Vishnu, and Shiva. The temple is known for its magnificent architecture, including the 22-feet high musical pillars and the 134-foot tall gopuram. The temple also features intricate carvings and sculptures, making it a significant historical and cultural site.
